phrases: I begin my weekends by feeding the birds.
And then I go home to shower.
After all that, I normally clean and have breakfast, and then I am done.
Chizu-chan and Ayane-chan are coming over.
Your friends are coming over today, are not they?
The other one seems to be pretty normal, though she is got a lot of makeup on.
How many piercings does she have?!
Come in, I was baking a cake.
I should have made something savory.
I will eat as much as you want me to.
Do not, you will get fat.
Well well, do not just stand at the door, do come in.
Would you two please have this?
Nice to finally meet you too.
She saved her from bombing a class.
I figured no one would be bothered if my room suits me or not.
I was looking through pictures of the trip, and you were in these ones.
You sure there are no ghosts in these photos?
Wow, they do not look creepy.
When did I do something so rude?!
Yano-chin sneaked that picture of you.
Come on, as much of a loser as he is, it would be sad if he could not hold up one girl.
Kazehaya caught on in that one.
All of a sudden, I have so many treasures.
Do not be so content with just pictures.
To go out with him, obviously!
I could not, and besides, I am already overwhelmed as it is.
I cannot imagine going any further.
What if someone takes Kazehaya away?
I do not think I could be happy for them.
I do not think I could congratulate them.
I guess you would not want to go out with someone right away just because you like them.
It is been ringing for a while.
It is a pain in the ass, so I figured, whatever.
I have things to do too, man.
I ran into Kuronuma last night.
What do you see behind me?
Why is she staring at me?
Sensei, be sure to wash your hands and gargle with salt water when you get home.
Why does she want me to cleanse?
But I got home and forgot all about her warnings.
All I could figure out is that he rented porn.
I do not know, but he sounded weak.
He wants me to bring Kuronuma.
Oh yeah, Chizuru said she is going to Kuronuma's place today.
I wonder if she would want to see Maru.
She will not become a bad girl?
She bought enough for us too.
They are telling ghost stories in there, so I ran away.
I am so awesome at washing dishes.
Thanks, you did not have to.
Nah, I am trying to show off here.
Sawako's got her dad's brows, eyes and nose.
And her mom's profile and mouth.
He wants to talk to you.
Let us all go to his place.
I guess it is too late for gargling if you are already in the nasal stage.
I bet Maru wants to see you too.
Should not you have said you wanted to see her too?
I mean, I thought you would.
And I even get to meet Kazehaya-kun.
How is it looking for me?
Why am I acting like his boyfriend?
do you think I am okay?
What are you growling at, Pedro?
There was this scratching sound yesterday night too.
He is hearing things because of the fever.
You are fine, please just get some rest and sleep.
Your room might take some time.
I am pretty good at that.
You want me to tell you a story until you fall asleep?
This actually happened in this neighborhood.
A man lived alone in an apartment.
He opens the door, but there is no one there.
Indeed, in that apartment, in that very room...
He sleeps pretty well for someone who just freaked out.
It is Kazehaya-kun when he was little.
I have infringed on your privacy.
No, I mean, it is embarrassing.
I am crying because I lost in a game.
Pin laughed at me so much.
Oh yeah, are not you going to play with Maru?
I did not want to get in Sanada-kun's way.
Y-You should go play with him.
I am going to ask you next time I am haunted.
Let me know if there is anything you want to talk about.
I know everything about Shouta and Ryu.
Come talk to me and I will tell you their soft spots.
They better not be talking smack.
Try it out when you want to thank him.
This is awesome, I feel so much better.
It ended sort of weird, but I will come over again.
I sort of do not want to part, since we were together all day.
The longer we are together, the harder it is to say bye.
Yeah, it is really dark, it is dangerous.
It is fine, I will be careful not to scare anyone.
Tell me if you do not want me to.
Say hi to your folks for me.
Why would not I want him to?
I want to thank him, but I cannot speak.
Arai-sensei told me to hold on to you and close my eyes for five seconds when I want to thank you.
Seriously, if you do that again, I do not know.
If I hear his voice so much,
and if I am with him so much,
and if I see him so much...
See, I cannot stand parting with him.
Do not look at me for a while.
I wonder if I will feel like telling him how I feel someday.
